about_the_game:
The government has tasked you a secret agent to infiltrate a Soda factory that has been using a unknown material nicknamed Element_3 to manufacture powerful soda weapons. You are to shutdown the factory from the inside via disabling five supercomputers. Use their own technology against them and breach your way through 25 levels reinforced with the factories security.

Soda Sabotage is a 2D top-down shooter. It has 25 five levels for the player to run the gauntlet with while dealing with 5 bosses along the way in order to complete their mission. Defeat the bosses and use their own unique weaponry to turn the tide against overwhelming odds.

Key features:
-25 levels
-5 unique bosses
-5 unique environments

The government has tasked you a secret agent to infiltrate a Soda factory that has been using a unknown material nicknamed Element_3 to manufacture powerful soda weapons. You are to shutdown the factory from the inside via disabling five supercomputers. Use their own technology against them and breach your way through 25 levels reinforced with the factories security.

Soda Sabotage is a 2D top-down shooter. It has 25 five levels for the player to run the gauntlet with while dealing with 5 bosses along the way in order to complete their mission. Defeat the bosses and use their own unique weaponry to turn the tide against overwhelming odds.

name: Soda Sabotage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 22000.556
  • Processor: intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9300H CPU @2.40GHz 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 475 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 22000.556
  • Processor: intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9300H CPU @2.40GHz 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630

short_description: Soda Sabotage is a Sci-fi 2D top-down shooter, where the player guns his way through 25 levels and 5 bosses belonging to a soda weapon factory using their own weapons against in order to disable the evil soda weapon making factory. Shoot, dash but most importantly survive!
